name: Lost and Found (Jiaxin Huang, shayshaun77, Tasmi Islam, darazard)
name_original: Lost and Found (Jiaxin Huang, shayshaun77, Tasmi Islam, darazard)
description:
Oh no, Piglet is lost inside the forest maze! Navigate the forest as Winnie the Pooh and find Piglet before sunset. Pooh's friends will assist him in his search by giving out clues, but watch out for the mean old Rabbit and his rabbit holes! Although, if Winnie tries hard enough, could the Rabbit become a friend?

Controls: 
  • Click on the red arrows to move before the timer ends
  • Click on an object to interact with it
  • Click to continue dialogue/cutscenes

 

Credits: 

Jiaxin (jiaxinhuang) - Game Scripter & Programmer

Tasmi (tasmi-315) - Cutscene Art

Dari (darazard) - Environment/Character Art & Narrative

Ashanti (shayshaun77) - UI & Sound
